divs: Sighting DetailsI was working the early shift at Tim Horton's. So I left the house about 5:30am. I was riding my bike. As I was turning onto a major street, I stopped dead in my tracks. I had to look upwards. It was over the lake.(Nippissing) I rubbed my eyes a few times thinking it was a trick. I saw a few cars go by and slow down at this time. I got off my bike and stared. It hovered. It looked like a balloon filled with the same stuff they use in street lights. It kept me staring for about 10 minutes. Then it was gone. No sound. No bright flash. I was left there stunned. I couldn't remember where I was going or what I was suppose to be doing. I finally got my stuff together, and got on my bike and rode to work. I didn't notice I was shaking, until a co-worker mentioned it. I told her what I had seen. She said it was probably a weather balloon. I called the next day and found out that the weather balloons are let go in Sudbury. Not North Bay. Any info would be greatly appreciated. I also have more.....
Summary: It looked like a glowing white baloon in the sky
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in North Bay
There were no other sightings in North Bay on or around June 8th 2000
